text: The following lists events that happened in 1951 in Iceland. ==Incumbents== *President - Sveinn Björnsson *Prime Minister - Steingrímur Steinþórsson ==Events== ==Births== Geir Haarde *1 March - Kristinn Sigmundsson, singer. *8 April - Geir Haarde, politician *1 May - Álfheiður Ingadóttir, politician *18 July - Thorvaldur Gylfason, economist ===Full date missing=== *Karólína Eiríksdóttir, composer ==Deaths== ==References== Category:1950s in Iceland Iceland Iceland Category:Years of the 20th century in Iceland
title: 1951 in Iceland
